to the Bench Time Management Program!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are receiving this training because you have been confirmed by your Resource Manager (RM) as a candidate available for new opportunities at EPAM. Because you are a valuable employee, we'd like to continue our partnership and help you to achieve your professional goal within EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Upon completion of this training you might be contacted by the US Bench Manager for a follow up session to further discuss your professional aspirations, business priorities, and potential opportunities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What you will
